Read the Discription, this does include Cleopatra.

As for the file size, I own this collection and Ceasar III is 680 MB, or somewhere around there, it barely fits on normal CDs.  The reason for that was with the collection they make a few changes to the installer files and it ended up causing an increase in file sizes.

As for Zeus not stating the install once you press install, is that you have to wait a few for it to start.  I had to wait about 30 seconds for the installer to begin working.  If it takes longer than 1 minute, might want to upgrade your antivirus software, as you probably have a virus on your system.

I have not tested Ceasar III yet, installing it later on, will post wiether or not it works.
